DOC.brief_summary: Patients locally confine prostate adenocarcinoma ( clinical stage T1c - T2bN0M0 , Gleason score 7 , PSA 20 ng/ml ) assign one two treatment arm . Low risk patient ( T1c-T2a PSA < 10 ng/ml Gleason Score 6 less ) receive 5 fraction 8.0 Gy total 40 Gy . Intermediate risk patient ( T2b PSA > 10 ng/ml orGleason Score 7 ) receive 1.8 Gy IMRT 25 fraction 5 week total 45 Gy . They receive boost consist 4 , 5.5 Gy fraction IMRT total 22 Gy .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Trial SBRT + - IMRT Treatment Patients With Clinically Confined Prostate Adenocarcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Patients locally confine prostate adenocarcinoma ( clinical stage T1c - T2bN0M0 , Gleason score 7 , PSA 20 ng/ml ) assign one two treatment arm . Low risk patient ( T1c-T2a PSA < 10 ng/ml Gleason Score 6 less ) receive 5 fraction 8.0 Gy total 40 Gy . Intermediate risk patient ( T2b PSA > 10 ng/ml orGleason Score 7 ) receive 1.8 Gy IMRT 25 fraction 5 week total 45 Gy . They receive boost consist 4 , 5.5 Gy fraction IMRT total 22 Gy . All patient assess toxicity periodic time point follow completion treatment .
